title: Isle Royale National Park: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       The National Park Service strives to keep the public informed about its news, accomplishments, special event, and employee recognition.  Isle Royale provides news releases to local and regional newspapers. Current and past news releases are also posted on this website.  For all inquiries, call the park headquarters at 906-482-0984 or by e-mail.
